segments.text: I think I've got a virus on my computer . Do you know how to get rid of it ? I haven't had one before .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid not . Why don't you call the Help Desk ? Someone there will be able to help you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you got the number ? I'll call them right now .
segments.speaker: S1
